gotabhaya mahatha janadhipathi karamin janathawa aarambha karana nawa palanayedi me katayuthu sidu wenawa . 16 wanidayin pasu janathawata ratata saubhagayyaye arunalla uda wenawa .eheth siyalu apeksha eka wita mal pala ganwenneth na .rata mul thana thaba katayuthu karana nayakayan  ekathu wi rata palanaya karana wita samayata ha rate sanwardhanayata kamathi siyalu denata nawum aashwadayak labewi .rate anagathaya surakshitha wenawa .ihala aarthika sanwardhanayak athi wimata patan gannawa .ewani ratak daru parapurata uruma wima maw ‚Äì piya ,wadi hiti samata mona tharam sathutak da ?deshabhimani hangimen yuth eda siti minisa apata ahimi kara thibenawa .ee minisa yali me polawe nirmanaya kara ganna oona .wathman deshapalana sanskruthiya anagathaye di wenas wiya yuththe ee nisayi .
